svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 10, 2023" date: "2023-06-10"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Summary & notes from Tim Beiko:
Cancun upgrade scope finalized: adds bounded EIP4788 (beacon root in EVM) &
tentatively EIP5656 (MCOPY) if implementation/testing not a bottleneck Cancun will not
include EIP2537 (BLS), EIP5920 (PAY) & EIP7069 (revamped CALL instructions) EIP4844
blobs per block set to 3 & 6 (target & limit) for devnets, may change for mainnet
Devnet 6 for EIP4844 to be launched next week Holešky testnet (Goerli successor) first
launch coordination call June 15, targeting September genesis (potentially too late
for Dencun testing)
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Summary & notes from Tim Beiko:
* Cancun upgrade scope finalized: adds bounded EIP4788 (beacon root in EVM) &
tentatively EIP5656 (MCOPY) if implementation/testing not a bottleneck
* Cancun will not include EIP2537 (BLS), EIP5920 (PAY) & EIP7069 (revamped CALL
instructions)
Cancun will not include EIP2537 (BLS), EIP5920 (PAY) & EIP7069 (revamped CALL
* EIP4844 blobs per block set to 3 & 6 (target & limit) for devnets, may change for
mainnet
EIP4844 blobs per block set to 3 & 6 (target & limit) for devnets, may change for
* Devnet 6 for EIP4844 to be launched next week
Devnet 6 for EIP4844 to be launched next week
* Holešky testnet (Goerli successor) first launch coordination call June 15, targeting
September genesis (potentially too late for Dencun testing)
Holešky testnet (Goerli successor) first launch coordination call June 15, targeting
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0-alpha.2 : increases MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK to 6 for EIP4844
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-alpha.2 : increases MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK to 6 for EIP4844
Layer 1
* Flood : benchmarking RPC endpoints for the EVM
Flood : benchmarking RPC endpoints for the EVM
* Terence: reducing Prysm validator's slot 0 propose time by precomputing the
shuffling
Terence: reducing Prysm validator's slot 0 propose time by precomputing the shuffling
Client releases
* Execution layer: Erigon v2.45.0 : Caplin (embedded CL) bug fixes & DB layout changed
for block bodies Nethermind v1.19.2 : support for upcoming Teku v23.6
* Erigon v2.45.0 : Caplin (embedded CL) bug fixes & DB layout changed for block bodies
Erigon v2.45.0 : Caplin (embedded CL) bug fixes & DB layout changed for block bodies
* Nethermind v1.19.2 : support for upcoming Teku v23.6
Nethermind v1.19.2 : support for upcoming Teku v23.6
For Stakers
* EL sync driver : sync a new EL client using an existing CL client, no CL config
changes required
Research
* Proposal to increase MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE , allows validator consolidation to
lighten networking load
Proposal to increase MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE , allows validator consolidation to lighten
networking load
* Verkle Tree proof generation & verification implementation optimization notes
Verkle Tree proof generation & verification implementation optimization notes
Layer 2
* Optimism Bedrock upgrade live, gas fees over 40% lower via data compression and ETH
native representation
Optimism Bedrock upgrade live, gas fees over 40% lower via data compression and ETH
* Arbitrum batch-poster bug caused a temporary pause in posting transactions onchain,
no loss of service from a user perspective
Arbitrum batch-poster bug caused a temporary pause in posting transactions onchain, no
loss of service from a user perspective
* Arbitrum time boost transaction ordering economic analysis
Arbitrum time boost transaction ordering economic analysis
EIPs/Standards
* ERCs: ERC7144 : ERC20 with transaction validation step ERC7160 : ERC721
multi-metadata extension
* ERC7144 : ERC20 with transaction validation step
ERC7144 : ERC20 with transaction validation step
* ERC7160 : ERC721 multi-metadata extension
ERC7160 : ERC721 multi-metadata extension
Stuff for developers
* Web3 interface libraries: web3.js v4 : rewritten in TypeScript, reduced build size,
modular & extensible via plugins viem v1 : includes opt-in batch JSON-RPC
Web3 interface libraries:
* web3.js v4 : rewritten in TypeScript, reduced build size, modular & extensible via
plugins
web3.js v4 : rewritten in TypeScript, reduced build size, modular & extensible via
* viem v1 : includes opt-in batch JSON-RPC
viem v1 : includes opt-in batch JSON-RPC
* evm.storage : view storage & state for verified contracts at a specific block, alpha
version
evm.storage : view storage & state for verified contracts at a specific block, alpha
* OpenZeppelin Contracts v4.9.1 : fixes DoS vulnerability in Governor &
GovernorCompatibilityBravo where proposal creation could be blocked by frontrunning
OpenZeppelin Contracts v4.9.1 : fixes DoS vulnerability in Governor &
* Foundry: Patrick Collins: Solidity development course - Foundry edition , 27 hours
of video Tip: invoke commands with custom profiles
Foundry:
* Patrick Collins: Solidity development course - Foundry edition , 27 hours of video
Patrick Collins: Solidity development course - Foundry edition , 27 hours of video
* Tip: invoke commands with custom profiles
Tip: invoke commands with custom profiles
* NatSpec best practices
NatSpec best practices
* abi-to-sol v0.8.0 : adds user-defined value types support
abi-to-sol v0.8.0 : adds user-defined value types support
* Titanoboa (Vyper interpreter) adds node interaction allowing deployment
Titanoboa (Vyper interpreter) adds node interaction allowing deployment
* snekmate v0.0.2 (Vyper contracts): adds wad_ln & wad_exp and EIP5267 support
snekmate v0.0.2 (Vyper contracts): adds wad_ln & wad_exp and EIP5267 support
* EVM diff : diff execution-level specs of EVM-compatible chains
EVM diff : diff execution-level specs of EVM-compatible chains
* Tenderly precise gas estimates in a single run
Tenderly precise gas estimates in a single run
* Noble cryptography updated : npm provenance used for transparent builds and ed25519
& ed448 provide non-repudiation
Noble cryptography updated : npm provenance used for transparent builds and ed25519 &
ed448 provide non-repudiation
* Merklefy : web app to generate merkle trees from a csv
Merklefy : web app to generate merkle trees from a csv
* Create first zk contract using Circom & Hardhat
Create first zk contract using Circom & Hardhat
Ecosystem
* EF run a node grants to encourage diversification, receive a Dappnode or a grant for
hardware
EF run a node grants to encourage diversification, receive a Dappnode or a grant for
* Vitalik: transitions to rollups, contract wallets and privacy
Vitalik: transitions to rollups, contract wallets and privacy
* ETH Seoul hackathon winners
ETH Seoul hackathon winners
* ETH Belgrade hackathon winners & list of projects
ETH Belgrade hackathon winners & list of projects
Enterprise
* Norwegian government tests putting their central bank issued Krone on Arbitrum
Notable at app layer
* Maker DAO deployed 500M DAI with Coinbase for 2.6% annual rewards
Maker DAO deployed 500M DAI with Coinbase for 2.6% annual rewards
* FLAIR metric to measure intra-pool LP competitiveness in AMM
FLAIR metric to measure intra-pool LP competitiveness in AMM
* Forkable stablecoin design to manage contentious chain forks
Forkable stablecoin design to manage contentious chain forks
* 0xSplits Swapper : received tokens swapped into an output token, stackable e.g.
create tax wallet
0xSplits Swapper : received tokens swapped into an output token, stackable e.g. create
tax wallet
* sudoswap v2 (NFT marketplace): onchain royalties, creator settings, ERC1155 support,
conditional orders and fee streaming
sudoswap v2 (NFT marketplace): onchain royalties, creator settings, ERC1155 support,
* Usernames.club : community namespaces for username NFTs, under usr.id, via Nouns
auctions
Usernames.club : community namespaces for username NFTs, under usr.id, via Nouns
* Summa : zk proof of solvency for CEX, beta
Summa : zk proof of solvency for CEX, beta
Job Listings
* Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
* Devconnect Istanbul: Production Assistant and Volunteer Coordinator
Devconnect Istanbul: Production Assistant and Volunteer Coordinator
* Protocol Engineer (DeFi) sought by Tunnel Vision Labs
Protocol Engineer (DeFi) sought by Tunnel Vision Labs
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* US SEC regulation by enforcement: Coinbase charged for operating as unregistered
securities exchange, broker & clearing agency and offer of securities for staking
program Coinbase issued show cause order from multiple state regulators for staking
rewards Binance & CZ charged with securities violations and misleading investors over
Binance US controls
US SEC regulation by enforcement:
* Coinbase charged for operating as unregistered securities exchange, broker &
clearing agency and offer of securities for staking program
Coinbase charged for operating as unregistered securities exchange, broker & clearing
agency and offer of securities for staking program
* Coinbase issued show cause order from multiple state regulators for staking rewards
Coinbase issued show cause order from multiple state regulators for staking rewards
* Binance & CZ charged with securities violations and misleading investors over
Binance & CZ charged with securities violations and misleading investors over Binance
US controls
* CFTC won Ooki DAO case , members of unincorporated association may have to pay the
fine
CFTC won Ooki DAO case , members of unincorporated association may have to pay the
* PoolTogether federal case dismissed as plaintiff failed to show they suffered harm
PoolTogether federal case dismissed as plaintiff failed to show they suffered harm
* ConsenSys forced to hold shareholder vote over intra-company transfer of MetaMask,
Infura, etc
ConsenSys forced to hold shareholder vote over intra-company transfer of MetaMask,
General/crypto
* Atomic wallet $35 million stolen
Atomic wallet $35 million stolen
* KeePass v2.54 fixes master password leak
KeePass v2.54 fixes master password leak
* SnarkJS library vulnerability
SnarkJS library vulnerability
* Hypernova implementation , proof of concept
Hypernova implementation , proof of concept
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-10-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jun 16 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort four application deadline
Jun 16 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort four application deadline
* Jun 20 – EF run a node grant deadline
Jun 20 – EF run a node grant deadline
* Jun 22–25 – Pragma Waterloo & ETHGlobal Waterloo hackathon
Jun 22–25 – Pragma Waterloo & ETHGlobal Waterloo hackathon
* Jul 5-9 – ETHBarcelona conference & hackathon
Jul 5-9 – ETHBarcelona conference & hackathon
* Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
* Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
* Aug 15-16 – ETHToronto & ETHWomen
Aug 15-16 – ETHToronto & ETHWomen
* Aug 16-19 – Ethereum Argentina (Buenos Aires)
Aug 16-19 – Ethereum Argentina (Buenos Aires)
* Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
* Aug 30 – Sep 3 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
Aug 30 – Sep 3 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
* Sep 1-3 – Ethcon Korea hackathon
Sep 1-3 – Ethcon Korea hackathon
* Sep 10-12 – Ethereum Singapore hackathon & conference
Sep 10-12 – Ethereum Singapore hackathon & conference
* Sep 11-13 – DappCon (Berlin)
Sep 11-13 – DappCon (Berlin)
* Sep 15 – Protocol Berg (Berlin)
Sep 15 – Protocol Berg (Berlin)
* Sep 18-21 – ETH Montréal conference & hackathon
Sep 18-21 – ETH Montréal conference & hackathon
* Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
* Oct 5-6 – ETHMilan conference
Oct 5-6 – ETHMilan conference
* Oct 6-8 – ETHRome hackathon
Oct 6-8 – ETHRome hackathon
* Oct 6–27 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Oct 6–27 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
* Oct 27–29 – ETH Miami festival & hackathon
Oct 27–29 – ETH Miami festival & hackathon
* Nov 3-5 – ETH Lisbon hackathon
Nov 3-5 – ETH Lisbon hackathon
* Nov 3-5 – ETHBrno
Nov 3-5 – ETHBrno
* Nov 13-19 – Devconnect (Istanbul)
Nov 13-19 – Devconnect (Istanbul)
* Nov 17-19 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
Nov 17-19 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
